text.autoconfig.divein.option.fluidLevel: Max detect blocks of fluid underneath
text.autoconfig.divein.option.triggerDep: Least fluid depth to activate the animation
text.autoconfig.divein.option.disableCap: Due to the fact that 1.20.9+ changed the entity render state, the cape may rotate abnormally if animation triggered. So in default the cape is disabled. This will be fixed in the future.
text.autoconfig.divein.title: Divein
